content: The Lord Praised for Rescuing David.

For the music director. A  of David, the servant of the LORD, who spoke to the LORD the words of this song on the day that the LORD rescued him from the hand of all his enemies and from the hand of Saul. And he said,
The  is my rock and my fortress and my savior,
My God, my rock, in whom I take refuge;
My shield and the horn of my salvation, my stronghold.
I call upon the , who is worthy to be praised,
And I am saved from my enemies.
